1.content: Time to create your characters
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
Foxhound's character

Name: Jack Wolfgang

Personality: Social easy to get along with but will go nuts if his friends are upset or harmed willing to fight if able to

Clothing/appearance: He wears a white t-shirt & a white jacket w/ red markings on it. He also wears white pants & sneakers with red on them as well. His hair is white with a hint of red in it and he has red eyes.

Midnight's character

Name: Jason Wolfgang

Personality: Shy (but willing to get along with people if they know Jack beforehand) very Protective of his brother He will hold a grunge against someone if they've upset him or Jack He prefers not to fight but will as a last resort or when absolutely necessary.

Clothing/Appearance: His clothing is the same as Jack's the only thing different is where Jack's outfit is white with red Jason's is black with blue He has black hair with a hint of blue in it as well as dark blue eyes.

Backstory: Jack & Jason act like brothers however they are half siblings because Jack's family took Jason in at a young age sense Jason's parents disappeared.
11.title: Character creation!

111.content:
Jason toyed with his hand while standing in front of the mirror. He wanted to look decent for school. Finally he setteled with his hair slightly over one of his blue eyes. I smiled at himself, slightly blushing. He practically leapt through the roof when Jack came up behind him.

"Its pretty funny when you can make yourself blush with your looks." Jack teased as he placed his hand on Jason's shoulder. Jason crossed his arms and pouted rather childishly.

"Does it at least look nice?" Jason asked glancing at the boy next to him. Jack smiled and nodded.

"I'm sure the guys will be drooling all over ya Bro." Jack teased yet again as he adjusted his hair rather carelessly.
111.title: *The Beginning*

choices: *Cut to when Jack & Jason get to school
1112.content: It had been 2 days sense Jack & Jason have gotten in Tatsumi Port island. During that time the two traveled around the area as well as going to the dorm they're going to be staying at for the year. While there they met 3 of their dorm mates. Yukari Takeba, a high school girl that will be in the same grade as Jack & Jason at Gekkoukan High which is the school they'll be going to. They also met 2 of their upperclassmen Akihiko Sanada, champ of the boxing team & Mitsuru Kerijo the student council president at Gekkoukan High. After that the boys headed home to get some sleep for tomorrow.
1112.title: A quick little flashback

choices: *Cut to when Yukari gives the boys a tour of the school*
*Cut to when the boys get back to the dorm*
11122.content:
*The next morning*

As Jack & his brother get up & get dressed there's a knock at their door, "Hey, are you two awake?" says a feminine voice on the other side of the door.

Jack opens the door & finds Yukari on the other end deciding to let her in she gives both the boys a smile. "Good your both up, come on it's time to head to school."

*On the monorail to school*

"I bet you two didn't have to travel to your old school this way huh?" Yukari asks referring to the fact that monorails are used to get everywhere. Jack chuckles at this & says "Oh how right you are." The boys look stunned as the notice how huge the high school is.
11122.title: *The next morning 1st day at school!*

choices: (And now time for a dull long speech from the principal.)
Cut to after school where the boys meet another student)
111221.content:
"The faculty office is through the door on the left & you can check where your classroom is on the bulletin board.. " Yukari trails off as she gives the boys a smile. "..And that concludes the tour. Sorry I can't stay & chat boys but I've gotta go to archery club." Jack gives her a grin and says "That's alright Yukari, you go do your thing & we'll do our thing."

With that said Yukari heads off as the boys check the bulletin board & find that they're in classroom 2-F, after that they head to the faculty office & meet their Composition teacher Mrs.Toriumi.
111221.title: Meeting the staff

choices: In the middle of the night the boys wake up in an unfamiliar place.
1112212.content:
Jack & Jason stand up as the bell signifies the end of the day. *yawn* "Thought I was gonna fall asleep in there." Yukari (who just so happens to be in the same home room as the two siblings) speaks as she turns to address the two boys, "Kinda funny that we'd end up in the same home room huh?" Yukari asks with a grin. Jack matches that grin & says "Yeah, we're just happy that we've got a friend in our classes." Jack says as Jason nods in agreement.

"A friend? Oh, you meant me!" Yukari says with a blush as she realizes what he meant. The 3 share a laugh as a voice suddenly speaks startling them, "Sup, dudes." Says the voice as the boys look over & see a boy about their age in a blue cap & school uniform. "Who are you?" Jack asks as the boy smiles, "Me? Name's Junpei Iori. I transferred here back in 8th grade so I know how tough it can be being the new kid. I'd be more then happy to show you the ropes."

"Thanks." Jack says as he fails to notice Jason staring at Junpei with a blush on his face. "Stop playing around, Stupei!" Yukari says irritated, Junpei just smiles "Yuka-tan! Still as blunt as ever I see." Jack snaps his fingers as he says "Me & my brother haven't properly introduced ourselves yet.." Jack trails off as he holds out his hand for a handshake, "Name's Wolfgang, Jackson Wolfgang." He puts his free hand on his younger brother's shoulder as he says this, "And this is my little brother, Jason Wolfgang." Junpei returns the handshake & says "Nice to meet ya!"

"Wait, Jason's your brother? How is that if you two don't look much alike?" Yukari asks very confused, Jack sighs & says "I'll tell you when we get back to the dorm." Yukari shouts as she checks the time "Speaking of the dorm we'd better get going cause if we aren't there by curfew Mitsuru'll have our heads!" With that everyone says their goodbyes to Junpei & heads back to the dorm.
1112212.title: Cut to after school where the boys meet another...

11122121.content:
The boys wake with a groan as the boys notice a man with a very long nose "Welcome to the velvet room." The man speaks as the boys look around the room and see that it's bathed in a bright blue as well as the fact that the room is a giant elevator. The man gains the boys attention again as he continues, "My name is Igor. My role in this is to help the two of you & your partners on the journey you will be involved in for the year."

"So you know about us do you?" A feminine voice says as a white wolf appears next to Jack. "We couldn't sit on the sidelines forever sister." A male voice says as a black wolf appears next to Jason. "This is Elizabeth, like myself she is also a resident of this room." Igor says referring to the gray haired girl standing next to him who seems to be holding a giant book in her hands. "A pleasure to meet you." Elizabeth says smiling.

"Hold on to these." Igor says as a key appears in both the boys hands, "When the four of you next visit you shall come here of your own accord, only then will my true role be revealed." The boys look at Igor confused before he says "Now, time marches on in your world." As Igor says this the boys visions begin to blur, "Farewell." Igor's voice fades as the boys slip into dreamland.
11122121.title: In the middle of the night the boys wake up in ...

12.content:
(My self inserted characters)

Name: Don the blue robot cat.

Personality: Intelligent, Silly (Sometimes) Kind-Hearted Helpful Friendly.

Clothes: None.

Name: Paul the yellow robot cat.

Personality: Complete nerd and heroic.

Clothes: None.

Back story: Two at first normal sized robot cats applied for two jobs as assistants in two different cities in two different countries. Don was hired to assist some scientists at Acme Labs in Tokyo Japan to combat Godzilla himself by enlarging him with their growth ray. Meanwhile in New York City, Paul was hired by Professor Willard to assist him in his experiments until the professor's monkey was enlarged by the Molecular Intensifier and had be to stopped at all costs as the professor used his device to enlarge Paul himself as Paul stomped off into the city to find the professor's monkey and engage him in a one on one king of the monsters themed match up.
12.title: Spunky's Characters.

13.content: Zondra (no last name) a girl with purple natural hair and eyes like a shadow she is 18 years old and has a large butt and double KK breasts. She is a fun loving adventurous girl and the 5th machine King in Pasidar's head commanders she has the ability in the dark hour to turn humans into Zonders at will.She is a form of Persona in the eyes of S.E.E.S but many of them see her as a good friend.
13.title: zondra the 5th machine king!

14.content:
Apparently some of the people that made character choice chapters on this are outright idiots....or trolling.
I mean, robot cats that can grow giant? A Mary Sue Hourglass Zondarian? The actual fuck?

https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/ori...

Not to be that guy who shits on everyone’s fun, but I think the rules should have a new addition: Try and follow the setting of the games. Giant robot cats chapter doesn’t even mention anything from the games, at least the Zondaria one does.
anyway, rant over
have setting compatible oc
———-
Name: Diego Marcus
Gender: Male
Age: 17
Sexuality: Straight
Acarina: The Chariot (Knight of Swords, Six of Swords)
Wild Card: no
Weapon: Glaive
Personality: Diego is distant, air-headed and crass at times, however he has a just heart and is willing to make and defend friendships. An overseas transfer student from America, he is a natural Persona user who has known of his unique power for a fair chunk of his life....and used it as well(though not correctly). This got the attention of the Kirijo Group, who ‘recruited’ and brought him to Japan so his skills with a Persona could be put to use in taking down Tartarus. He doesn’t mind that he has to go a Japanese school.{dropnote:"Really, it’s better then his previous school was...."}Diego’s Persona started to mainfest during the beginning of high school after a string of bullying incidents, one involving him, and it drove most people away from him for being a ‘freak‘ when he had trouble controlling it. A big chunk of his airheadedness is faked, a holdover from being shunned. He has a bad habit of getting lost in Tartarus.
Persona: Göndul. It looks like a slender, armoured man with eagle wings for arms and talons for feet, one carrying a long sharp spike. A Combat-type Persona and that uses Garu(wind) and Pierce-type skills. Based off one of the Norse Valkyires. Brought out with the use of the Evoker, this is Diego’s Persona fully unlocked. He’s able to use it without an Evoker, but it can only use Garu and Single Shot.
Clothing: Gekkoukan Uniform, white sneakers with mint green socks, those gloves Akihiko wears, wing necklace
——-
Hope this is aduequte.
14.title: Can I vent for a second? Also Diego

info.brief_description: A retelling of Persona 3 but with myself & Midnightwolf as characters
info.description:
Anyone can add themselves in if they want to make their own plot for the story.

HOWEVER there are rules 1. No text slang use actual words 2. No insulting other people or races & 3. No scat for reasons I should not need to address.

NEW RULE!: Make sure when you add yourself into the story make sure you fallow the plot line of the persona 3 video game (use my & Midnightwolf's branch as a reference if you've never heard of the game or never played it) I'll allow some exceptions as long as you ask me in a email first.
Other then that go nuts & sense the game is m rated there will be blood & other things so if you have a week stomach you best turn away now

Have fun!

8/15/2019 update: I'm looking for additions to my interactives! I'll give gp as rewards for the adds, however I do have rules for this:

1. If you do a character choice chapter you'll get 100 gp
2. If you do a story chapter you'l get 500 or 1000+ gp depending on the chapter's length
3. Stick to the guidelines of the interactive you add to
4. Lastly DON't add choice chapters over and over if you think you'll get more gp for it! If someone does so they will only get 100 gp for the FIRST chapter because if they do that it's not fair to others that may want to add to one of the interactives!
